quote: If you look at the kind of cost-cutting we’ve been able to achieve with the military and at the same time ordering vast amounts of equipment — saved hundreds of millions of dollars on airplanes, and really billions, because if you take that out over a period of years it’s many billions of dollars — I think we’ve had a tremendous success.
quotePlain: If you look at the kind of cost-cutting we’ve been able to achieve with the military and at the same time ordering vast amounts of equipment — saved hundreds of millions of dollars on airplanes, and really billions, because if you take that out over a period of years it’s many billions of dollars — I think we’ve had a tremendous success.
name: Donald Trump
where: aboard Air Force One en route to West Palm Beach, FL

claims.title: Trump saved hundreds of millions on F-35
claims.negative: Trump didn't save hundreds of millions on F-35
claims.negativePlain: Trump didn’t save hundreds of millions on F-35
claims.truth: Most of the cuts were already planned.
claims.truthPlain: Most of the cuts were already planned.
